import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { BrowserRouter, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserLogin from './components/user/Login' import UserRegister from './components/user/Register' import User from './components/user/User' import UserLoginMultiAuth from './components/user/LoginMultiAuth' class App extends React.Component { render() { return (
  • Register
  • Login

    • About this App

    1. This app demonstrates Multi-Factor User Authentication.
    2. You will need Google Authenticator App to test this.
    3. Multi-Factor Authentication is turned off by default.
    4. This app saves your browser fingerprint, once logged in MFA wont be required again for that browser.
     ) } } export default App
